citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1530 (3:30
pm) on 18-Apr-17.
Called about 3:30 pm and again at about 1600(4:00 pm) and left messages on phone.
